feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.91.2
entry.content:
Just a small bugfix release for an issue where invalid domains would cause a page error on the Creator list.

What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Handle invalid domains safely in Link#site by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3306

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.91.1...v0.91.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.91.3
entry.content:
Another little bugfix release for you all, while we keep working on an exciting geometry feature behind the scenes!

What's Changed

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Prevent bad URLs from causing page errors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3311
  • Fix file size calculation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3315

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.91.2...v0.91.3

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.92.0
entry.content:
Happy New Year! This first release of 2025 has a late Christmas present; a new rendering mode, which should help your previews look more realistic! Choose "Realistic with shadows" in your user settings, and you should get something like this:

There are also a couple of bugfixes in this release, but most of the work is still going on behind the scenes on some fairly complex geometry work that we hope to release soon.

What's Changed

✨ New Features ✨

  • Add shadowed rendering mode using an SSAO pass by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3352

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Fix scan failure when library path contains a space by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3353
  • Fix error when auto-creating federation actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3354

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.91.3...v0.92.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.93.0
entry.content:
Just a small release for translation updates, bugfixes, and a new message when no activities are shown on the front page.

What's Changed

✨ New Features ✨

  • Add message on home page with no activity by @mtancoigne in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3375
  • Translation updates across DE, PL, ES and lots for FR by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3376

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Fix error viewing OIDC users by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3373

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Improved syntax for single-arg block parameters by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3369

New Contributors

  • @mtancoigne made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3375

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.92.0...v0.93.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.94.0
entry.content:
This release brings a better upload experience, with resumable uploads if your connection fails, and better performance.

What's Changed

✨ New Features ✨

  • Resumable uploads using Tus by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3384

🐛 Bug Fixes 🐛

  • Choose renderable files for previews if possible by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3388

🛠️ Other Improvements 🛠️

  • Specify Node version for Volta tool by @mtancoigne in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3374
  • Translations for recent features by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3387

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.93.0...v0.94.0
